Name: Tang Pei
Text: Old Version Main Story Iteration

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>Zong, is there anything else on your mind?</size>

Name: Zong
Text: <size=30>Can you promise me one thing, Commandant?</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>What is it?</size>

Name: Zong
Text: <size=30>Leave those human soldiers to me.</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>Dialogue Here 2</size>

Name: Zong
Text: <size=30>Dialogue Here 2</size>

Name: Forsaken Soldier A
Text: <size=30>Attack</size>

Name: Forsaken Soldier A
Text: <size=30>Catch up with them.</size>

Name: Forsaken Soldier B
Text: <size=30>Don't let them get away.</size>

Name: Forsaken Soldier C
Text: <size=30>Hurry up...</size>

Name: Forsaken Soldier C
Text: <size=30>What's this?</size>

Name: Forsaken Soldier C
Text: <size=30>Something is spreading!!!</size>

Name: Forsaken Soldier D
Text: <size=30>Ahhh!!!</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>Zong?</size>

Name: Zong
Text: <size=30>Ah... What's coming?</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>Hetero-Creatures?</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>Nice shot!</size>

Name: Zong
Text: <size=30>Hm...</size>

Name: Zong
Text: <size=30>Watch out! Behind you!</size>

Name: Zong
Text: <size=30>Commandant...</size>

Name: Forsaken Soldier
Text: <size=30>Help me!</size>

Name: Forsaken Soldier
Text: <size=30>What's this?!</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>How do you feel now?</size>

Name: Zong
Text: <size=30>Much better...</size>

Name: Zong
Text: <size=30>Guess we're surrounded...</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>Don't give up. It's not the first time.</size>

Name: Zong
Text: <size=30>...I promise I'll take you out!</size>

Name: Forsaken Soldier
Text: <size=30>I will complete this mission and kill you all.</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>Zong, watch out!</size>

Name: Nigel
Text: <size=30>You are as weak as always.</size>

Name: Nigel
Text: <size=30>You're tired already? That's not enough.</size>

Name: Nigel
Text: <size=30>Cool. Try again.</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=30>It's too risky...</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=30>How's your situation?</size>

Name: Nithart
Text: <size=30>So heavy...</size>

Name: Nithart
Text: <size=30>But it's okay. My mind is still clear.</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=30>I'm coming to you.</size>

Name: Forsaken Soldier
Text: <size=30>Something's off.</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=30>Defense formation!</size>

Name: Forsaken Soldier
Text: <size=30>Take this!</size>

Name: Forsaken Soldier
Text: <size=30>What... Ahhh!</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=30>Retreat!</size>

Name: Nithart
Text: <size=30>No contact!</size>

Name: Nithart
Text: <size=30>Go back! Turn left!</size>

Name: Forsaken Soldier
Text: <size=30>Captain, come in!</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=30>What's the situation?</size>

Name: Nithart
Text: <size=30>Just one more safety door to the deep well.</size>

Name: Nithart
Text: <size=30>But that safety door requires a key.</size>

Name: Nithart
Text: <size=30>The terminal cannot access the door without the key.</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=30>The key... I'll find it.</size>

Name: Nithart
Text: <size=30>I'm counting on you, soldier. Let me empty the gas with the evacuation system.</size>

Name: Nithart
Text: <size=30>This is the surveillance record.</size>

Name: Nithart
Text: <size=30>Should be useful to you.</size>

Name: Soldier
Text: <size=30>Why is the passcode still not here? There's no time to waste.</size>

Name: Soldier
Text: <size=30>Seems there's no way to take these data out.</size>

Name: Soldier
Text: <size=30>Retreat! Hurry! This way! They're coming!</size>

Name: Soldier
Text: <size=30>I have the passcode!</size>

Name: Nithart
Text: <size=30>Did you find it?</size>

Name: Nithart
Text: <size=30>Hurry!</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=30>Protect Nithart!</size>

Name: Nithart
Text: <size=30>It opens!</size>

Name: Soldier
Text: <size=30>Captain, they're back.</size>

Name: Nithart
Text: <size=30>Overload shutdown as I expected...</size>

Name: Nithart
Text: <size=30>I'll reboot it. And what's left to do is... um...</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=30>You?</size>

Name: Nithart
Text: <size=30>It's just too much exercise.</size>

Name: Soldier
Text: <size=30>Something is attacking the server.</size>

Name: Nithart
Text: <size=30>Then I'll leave them to you.</size>

Name: Nithart
Text: <size=30>Reboot complete. What's left to do is...</size>

Name: Ballard's Comms
Text: <size=30>Watch out! Strong...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>This place isn't safe. We need to keep going...</size>

Name: Child: Russ
Text: <size=30>...What's that noise, Mom? I-I'm scared...</size>

Name: Russ' Mother: Kelly
Text: <size=30>...Hush, don't make any sound. Lucia and Liv are going to get us out.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Are Lucille and the others catching up?</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>They're right behind us. There are many wounded in their vehicle, so they're moving slowly.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>...Is the drone still working?</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>Just barely... The Punishing Virus concentration here should be low enough for it to fly. We won't need to worry about it getting corrupted for now.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>The terrain here is constantly shifting... Let's start the drone and make sure the path ahead is safe.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>It's ready... The drone still has some ammo left. It will take out some of the Hetero-Creatures.</size>

Name: Drone System
Text: <size=30>—Hetero-Creatures detected.</size>

Name: Drone System
Text: <size=30>—Target locked. Ready to launch.</size>

Name: Drone System
Text: <size=30>—Projectile launched.</size>

Name: Drone System
Text: <size=30>—Target terminated.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>The drone has landed... There's not enough power for it to fly again.</size>

Name: Child: Russ
Text: <size=30>Is the road ahead safe, Liv?</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>I'm not sure yet. We still need to be careful...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>—It's the Red Tide! Run!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>The terrain here is different from what the map shows!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>We'll defeat them first!</size>

Name: Child: Russ
Text: <size=30>Mom! Mom—!</size>

Name: Russ' Mother: Kelly
Text: <size=30>Don't worry, Mom is here. I'll keep you safe... Go away—go away—!</size>

Name: Russ' Mother: Kelly
Text: <size=30>Get away from me! Go away!</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>Watch out!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>The terrain here is completely different from the map...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>The Red Tide has completely changed the landscape... Is there another way out?</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>...There. Where the Hetero-Creatures just appeared.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>There might be a path behind the bushes.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>My thruster is still working... Liv, stay here and protect them. I'll scout ahead.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>Be careful.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>...The Red Tide did cut off the path.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>We should be able to cross here.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>Okay. Stay safe!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>...Quickly! This way!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Ahead of us... The signal is getting stronger!</size>

Name: Child: Russ
Text: <size=30>I-I can't run anymore... Huff...</size>

Name: Gurle
Text: <size=30>M-me neither. I-I can't run any longer...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>This area is safe for now... Take a break, Lucia.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Alright... Stay on comms. We may need to move at a moment's notice.</size>

Name: Researcher: Engh
Text: <size=30>...Plants evolved from the Red Tide?</size>

Name: Researcher: Engh
Text: <size=30>Is that... traces of the Red Tide on it...?</size>

Name: Reinforcement
Text: <size=30>Bzzz—Gray Raven—</size>

Name: Reinforcement
Text: <size=25>Escape—bzzz—direction—</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=25>Reinforcement shouldn't be too far ahead of us...</size>

Name: Reinforcement
Text: <size=25>Bzzz—Hetero-Creatures—cannot—bzzz—right now—</size>

Name: Reinforcement
Text: <size=25>Bzzz—your nine o'clock—bzzz—stand by—</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=25>They seem to have run into troubles too. They're asking us to stay put...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Watch out!!!</size>

Name: Researcher: Engh
Text: <size=30>M-my equipment!</size>

Name: Researcher: Engh
Text: <size=30>Ugh... My equipment...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>Run! Toward our nine o'clock!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>...Aaargh...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=25>Lucia?! What's happening?!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>My... M.I.N.D... seems to be...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Liv... Liv! What's wrong?!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>...What's happening...?</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>N-no... This is...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>N-no... This is...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=25>Lucia... Wake up...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=25>W-what...? Liv?</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=25>Wake up... M.I.N.D...</size>

Name: Researcher: Engh
Text: <size=25>Information on the Red Tide... I need to...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=25>Is it... M.I.N.D. disorder? Am I seeing... hallucination?</size>

Name: Child: Russ
Text: <size=25>Lucia...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=25>Lucia... Wake up...</size>

Name: Gurle
Text: <size=25>I don't want to die. I-I don't... want to die...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=25>Take care of yourself, Lucia.</size>

Name: Child: Russ
Text: <size=25>Sob... Lucia...</size>

Name: Russ' Mother: Kelly
Text: <size=25>Lucia, watch out...!</size>

Name: Researcher: Engh
Text: <size=25>Information... on the Red Tide...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>My M.I.N.D... Aaargh, Commandant...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Hm...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Wake up... I have to wake up...</size>

Name: Child: Russ
Text: <size=30>...Lucia!</size>

Name: Russ' Mother: Kelly
Text: <size=30>Lucia...!</size>

Name: Gurle
Text: <size=30>Wake...</size>

Name: Researcher: Engh
Text: <size=30>Wake up...!</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>It's been a pleasure, Lucia. Goodbye.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>Lucia! Wake up!</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>We can't stay here any longer! We must move!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>—Liv!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Aaargh—!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Liv! Behind you!</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>...Lucia, are you okay?</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>There was a slight disorder in my M.I.N.D., and I was hallucinating...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>I might need some time... Can you take it from here, Liv?</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>I can do it.</size>

Name: Child: Russ
Text: <size=30>Liv, my mom isn't feeling well...</size>

Name: Child: Russ
Text: <size=30>C-can you come and check on her?</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>I'm coming.</size>

Name: Russ' Mother: Kelly
Text: <size=30>Rus... get to the Clean Zone. Find your uncle... His name is Grice, remember his name...</size>

Name: Child: Russ
Text: <size=30>M-Mom, don't cry... Sob...</size>

Name: Researcher: Engh
Text: <size=30>Cough... The fluctuation just now... The data on the Red Tide...</size>

Name: Researcher: Engh
Text: <size=30>Please... take the data with you. Don't forget our names...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>...I promise I'll bring it back for you.</size>

Name: Gurle
Text: <size=30>Aaargh...! It hurts!</size>

Name: Gurle
Text: <size=30>Thank you, Liv.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>Luckily, there are some medications left...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>Initiating recovery energy system.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>Don't worry. Your mother's injuries aren't very serious...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Cough... How are things looking on your side, Liv?</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>I'm okay. Lucille and the others are still behind us. I'm going to back them up...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>I'm okay.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>...Liv?!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>—Watch out!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Is there really no way out?</size>

Name: Lucille
Text: <size=30>—Take it easy. You still got us, don't you?</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=30>The mission consists of two phases, which will be carried out one after the other. And I will monitor and guide you through the drone in real time.</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=30>Phase one, find the rescue target. You would only be provided with a detailed field report in games.</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=30>In the real world, you are the ones who provide such info.</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=30>Get going. The countdown has started.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>Copy that.</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=30>...Too slow. Pay attention to the wall and the ground ahead. No one would hand you information like this in real battles. You'll have to rely on yourself.</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=30>I hope you still remember what your textbooks taught you. For example, guidelines for multi-party rescue.</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=30>Good. Saving people with high survival probabilities first is the most rational choice. You have to learn to make sacrifices in rescue. Wait... What are you doing?</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>Of course. Secure the minimal rescue achievement first... and try to save more people.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>Both the textbooks and the instructors are right. We have to learn to make sacrifices in rescue. But compared to that, I prefer to not making any sacrifice.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>I've got their attention! Hurry!</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=20>...Do you have any idea what you're doing? You think you're brave?</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=20>If a Construct can take care of the rescue mission singlehandedly,</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>I understand.</size>

Name: Ross
Text: <size=30>Thank you for not giving up on us...</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>No problem. Others will do the same.</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=30>...You're lucky that you're executing a mission in the simulation system. You won't change anything in reality.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>At least I tried my best. I have nothing to regret.</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=30>Forget it... Phase two. Analyze clues and find three alone persons to rescue.</size>

Name: Tom
Text: <size=30>It hurts... Someone... please help me stop bleeding...</size>

Name: Tom
Text: <size=30>Thank you... for saving my life.</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=30>Watch out! The Corrupted are coming again!</size>

Name: Keith
Text: <size=30>Thank you. I thought I was going to die...</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=30>...Alright, come back. Slowly. Pay attention to the blood on the ground. I don't want to see another low score. One is enough.</size>

Name: Catherine
Text: <size=30>I-I'm alive! Thanks for not giving up looking for me!</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=30>That's enough. Time's up. The assessment is over.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>No problem. Others will do the same.</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=20>then it would be an elimination mission instead!</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=20>But... if the risk I take could save one more life.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=25>I have no reason to sit around doing nothing.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>The Support Force will go first. You... and Norman's researchers take the routes we confirmed safe.</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=30>Got it. Let's keep in touch.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>...Then, let's move out!</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>Body of a researcher...? Why is it here? No one was here when we entered the mine back then.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>These wounds don't make sense. The fatal one should be this blunt injury, but there is also a gunshot wound in the leg.</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=30>Multiple wounds in addition to the lethal one... This is not as simple as it seems.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>Let's go. Perhaps we can find something else.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>An elevator. Not sure if I can get it started.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=25>Hmm... Seems the power is out. Just have to restore it.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>...A shot in the head.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>Here. A shot in the heart.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>Can't believe these machines can still work after all these years.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>Every body seems to have multiple wounds all over, but only one of these wounds is lethal.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>Besides... they're all here. It's empty just steps away. And there are no traces of running away or struggling on them.</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=30>You mean they were moved here after death?</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>Yes. This way it explains why the Support Force didn't run into anyone during the rescue mission back then.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>Plus, someone seems to have deliberately broken the elevator to cover something up.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>For some shameful reason, they insulted the dead like this... Those guys are psychopaths!</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=30>Let's keep going. We need more clues.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>These wounds are weird. There are knife cuts, gunshots, and irregular blunt injuries. They look similar to what we've seen earlier but are actually different.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>Many of them are already lethal, but the murderer went on adding more wounds after the victims died.</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=30>According to what you said, it feels like the murderer already lost their mind and was purely venting their anger on them.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>Judging from their postures, they seem to have been moved here after death as well.</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=30>Someone specially piling them up near the passage. Are they trying to make these like kills by the Corrupted?</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>That's possible. If the investigators are not experienced enough, they might be misled into believing the Corrupted did these.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>Keep going. I think the truth is not far from us.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>These wounds are weird. There are knife cuts, gunshots, and irregular blunt injuries. They look similar to what we've seen earlier but are actually different.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>Many of them are already lethal, but the murderer went on adding more wounds after the victims died.</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=30>According to what you said, it feels like the murderer already lost their mind and was purely venting their anger on them.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>Exactly. This is different than the professional and neat style we just saw.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>Judging from their postures, they seem to have been moved here after death as well.</size>

Name: Trojan
Text: <size=30>Someone specially piling them up near the passage. Are they trying to make these like kills by the Corrupted?</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>That's possible. If the investigators are not experienced enough, they might be misled into believing the Corrupted did these.</size>

Name: Bridget
Text: <size=30>Keep going. I think the truth is not far from us.</size>

Name: Echo
Text: <size=25>CRIT DMG is the most critical damage of all!</size>

Name: Hanying
Text: <size=25>CRIT DMG is the most critical damage of all!</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=25>CRIT DMG is the most critical damage of all!</size>

Name: Blubber
Text: <size=25>It's the Ultima Slash! Run for it!</size>

Name: Tai'E
Text: <size=25>It's the Ultima Slash! Run for it!</size>

Name: Echo
Text: <size=25>Going berserk? Don't you dare!</size>

Name: Hanying
Text: <size=25>Going berserk? Don't you dare!</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=25>Going berserk? Don't you dare!</size>

Name: Dejected Employee
Text: <size=30>That's our instant noodle, and this art gallery is our workplace! Get outta here!</size>

Name: Mercenary A
Text: <size=30>Your workplace? You people got fired a few days ago. We wouldn't have been sent here and got stuck with y'all if it weren't for that little protest of yours.</size>

Name: Dejected Employee
Text: <size=30>But we have a kid here...</size>

Name: Mercenary A
Text: <size=30>Get over yourselves! The kid's crazy, and you're not the only one starving. We lost a man protecting you from those rogue robots!</size>

Name: Mercenary A
Text: <size=30>Hand over the instant noodle now! We found it first! Or else...</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>Lucia, go help them.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Fine.</size>

Name: Mercenary A
Text: <size=20>Where'd this chick come from, acting all tough and mighty?</size>

Name: Mercenary A
Text: <size=20>What? You think you can take me on?</size>

Name: Mercenary B
Text: <size=20>We'll stay out of it. Let them fight one-on-one.</size>

Name: Mercenary B
Text: <size=20>Don't want these employees complaining about us ganging up on them later.</size>

Name: Mercenary C
Text: <size=20>Something's not right here...</size>

Name: Mercenary C
Text: <size=20>Don't tell me she's actually trained...</size>

Name: Mercenary D
Text: <size=30>Employee, my ass!</size>

Name: Mercenary D
Text: <size=20>She must be with that cloaked woman.</size>

Name: Mercenary D
Text: <size=30>Charge!</size>

Name: Mercenary A
Text: <size=25>There's no freakin' way!</size>

Name: Mercenary A
Text: <size=30>Hey, stop. We can talk this out. We're just starving and we never want to hurt anyone.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>I know, but the Red Tide is about to flood the streets entirely, and we've got to deal with that first.</size>

Name: Mercenary A
Text: <size=30>The Red Tide? What's that?</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>It's a very dangerous liquid. Now, let's bear with it and behave ourselves here.</size>

Name: Dejected Employee A
Text: <size=30>Hey, check out those things back there...</size>

Name: Dejected Employee B
Text: <size=30>This again? Looks weird though...</size>

Name: Dejected Employee C
Text: <size=30>Is it trying to kill us?! Why??</size>

Name: Dejected Employee D
Text: <size=30>H-help me...!</size>

Name: Mercenary A
Text: <size=30>Hurry up and fall back!</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>Let's get these people to safety first!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>I'll bring up the rear!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Be careful, Commandant.</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>Don't worry.</size>

Name: Dejected Employee C
Text: <size=30>Where in the world did they even come from? I thought the butterflies were the only things around.</size>

Name: Mercenary A
Text: <size=30>Give us the noodles now and we just might be able to keep all your butts safe a little longer.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Commandant, how are you feeling? I'll get you some medicine and find you a place to rest once we reach the infirmary.</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>I'm fine... Let's calm everyone down first.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>There are still people on the third floor. Let's head over there and get them to come down here to listen to what Commandant has to say.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>This is the last line of defense... I have to hold this position, and nip the Red Tide in the bud, so the tragedy at Pulia Forest Park doesn't happen again.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Phew... it's only been a few minutes... Just how many more years is it gonna be until the Hetero Tower is finally here...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Commandant… have you returned to the time we came from? Have you received proper treatment?</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>It's alright, it's alright. I can get through this. This frame is gonna get me through this.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>How long has it been? Twenty years? Thirty? My terminal is completely dead already...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>...Yeah, I should have brought it up back then... I have to bring this up to Commandant when we see each other again...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>...And then... we're going to revisit all the places we've been together... The Gray Raven will never...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>...Commandant, I miss you... I miss you so much... </size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Lucia, we meet again. Good job on keeping me trapped in the Fog for so long, but look at what's become of you.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>It doesn't matter what I've become, as long as that means your plans are doomed.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>...It's time we put this to an end.</size>

<size=50>The Gray Raven Commandant had a long, strange dream,


witnessing Lucia's endless sacrifices and losses within.</size>

<size=30>Please close your eyes, and look away from her.\nAs long as you don't watch, her battle in the dream lasts but a moment.\nAs long as you don't watch, her suffering cannot seep from dreams into reality.</size>

<size=30>Wake up, and don't watch as time tears her apart.
Wake up, and let this torment end, even if only in dreams.
Don't look at her anymore.
Please... don't look at her anymore...</size>
<size=50>Twenty years later</size>

Name: Mercenary 1
Text: <size=30>W-Why... are there dead people here...?</size>

Name: Chiko
Text: <size=30>Butterflies. I ran into them on my way down looking for the exit.</size>

Name: Mercenary 1
Text: <size=30>C'mon, stop freaking me out...</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>It's indeed because of those butterflies.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Commandant! Watch out!</size>

Name: Mercenary 1
Text: <size=30>The light? What's wrong with it again...</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>You should head back first if you don't feel well.</size>

Name: Mercenary 2
Text: <size=30>You, too, Sam. You should head back if you aren't feeling well!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Wait, don't touch him!</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>He's at a high level of corruption. When did he become corrupted?</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Cradle... She's probably why his corruption is happening as fast as it is.</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>Is it possible for those red butterflies to live off humans?</size>

Name: Mercenary 1
Text: <size=30>Is it what? What are you talking about...</size>

Name: Mercenary 3
Text: <size=30>One of... the butterflies... got in my mouth... </size>

Name: Mercenary 3
Text: <size=30>Uhh... my stomach... it hurts so much...! </size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>Do we have any Serum left?</size>

Name: Mercenary 3
Text: <size=30>...Be... Careful... </size>

Name: Mercenary 1
Text: <size=30>Ahhh! I'm going to kill every last one of these things!</size>

Name: Mercenary 2
Text: <size=30>Something is pulling me! Help! Help me!</size>

Name: Mercenary 4
Text: <size=30>Argh! ... Watch where you're shooting... You idiot! </size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>I'll go check it out...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>I'm going with you, Commandant. You guys can head back first.</size>

Name: Mercenary 5
Text: <size=25>The wounded can head back. We're staying. God knows if you guys are just gonna leave us here to die if you find a way out!</size>

Name: Mercenary 6
Text: <size=30>He's got a point. We're all gonna end up starving to death here if we don't get out. Nobody wants to start cannibalism today, so I'm going with you guys no matter what you say.</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>Well, then. Those of you who are hurt should head back first.</size>

Name: Mercenary 4
Text: <size=30>I'm not going back... I'm doing just fine, and God knows what I'm gonna run into on my own if I head back alone now.</size>

Name: Mercenary 1
Text: <size=30>Uhh... right, you have a point. I'm staying, too.</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>...Let's move along, then.</size>

Name: Mercenary 1
Text: <size=30>...Alright. Stay safe.</size>

Name: Chiko
Text: <size=30>It wasn't this bad when we came here last time... No, pretty sure the same thing is gonna happen even if we head back now, so let's just move along.</size>

Name: Mercenary 1
Text: <size=30>Screw this, I'm done with this sh*t! I'm taking all of you down with me!</size>

Name: Mercenary 5
Text: <size=30>Gee, this place is getting creepier by the second!</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>Access granted. Let's move.</size>

Name: Mercenary 4
Text: <size=30>Argh! The butterflies... argh! They got into my throat!</size>

Name: Mercenary 4
Text: <size=30>They have us cornered! I'm gonna... I'm gonna stop them!</size>

Name: Mercenary 4
Text: <size=30>Keep going and find the exit so I don't sacrifice for nothing!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>I just checked and found that there's actually a floor where the elevator doesn't stop. It's right above where we are. Probably between B7 and B8.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>It's safe here since the butterflies haven't shown up yet. Let me see if there is a way to make the elevator stop on the hidden floor.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Mona said we should be able to get a temporary code from down there.</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>Alright, be careful.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>There was a massacre... Before we got here... and his access card had been used, too. Could it be Cradle?</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>We're missing one. All these cards come with a high concentration of the Punishing. She took them but put them back here.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>I just went ahead and had our access activated, Commandant.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Our temporary code is 973654 . Gotta remember this number.</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>The elevator is here. Let's go.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Yup, coming.</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=30>Let's keep going.</size>

<size=27>>>>Initiating Verification<<<-------
Verifying-------------------
------------------
------------------
------------------
<color=#0CC627>>>>Verification Successful>>></color></size>
<size=35><color=#F42010>>>>No Access Card Detected<<<</color></size>
<size=27>Access Card Read and Activated Successfully\n------------------\n<color=#0CC627>>>>Activation Complete<<<</color></size>

Name: Mercenary 6
Text: <size=30>Hurry up and fall back!</size>

Name: Mechanoid A
Text: <size=30>——Movement of Recon Robot 2154 is restricted. Assistance is required——</size>

Name: Mechanoid A
Text: <size=30>—Thank you for helping 2154.</size>

Name: Mechanoid A
Text: <size=30>——Attention, signs of abnormal life form activity detected——</size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=30>Huh? How is this possible...</size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=30>Welp, doesn't matter! Nanami will send you back to the Red Tide!</size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=30>Greetings. This is Recon Robot 2154.</size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=30>Hi there, Recky!</size>

Name: Mechanoid A
Text: <size=30>Greetings. This is Recon Robot 2154.</size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=30>Recky, are there any other trapped robots nearby?</size>

Name: Mechanoid A
Text: <size=30>——Signs of life detected. Please follow 2154.</size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=30>Blocked, huh? Let Nanami handle this!</size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=30>Ha! Nailed it!</size>

Name: Girl
Text: <size=30>H-help... please...</size>

Name: Mechanoid D
Text: <size=20>——Battle Robot 3274——</size>

Name: Mechanoid D
Text: <size=30>Initiating Battle Mode</size>

Name: Man
Text: <size=30>Is... is Babylonia here to save us?</size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=30>My name is Nanami! But... I guess I'm cool with you giving Babylonia all the credit...</size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=30>The Red Tide here sure is fierce and scary!</size>

Name: Man
Text: <size=30>There was this person that's white from head to toe... The Red Tide changed as soon as she got here!</size>

Name: Man
Text: <size=30>She came but left... and thank God she left, or else we all would have been long gone...</size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=30>And you were saying... she showed up in the Red Tide?</size>

Name: Mechanoid B
Text: <size=30>——Attention, signs of abnormal life form activity detected——</size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=30>Hey! ...Damn it, we're too late...</size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=20>...Something's not right, this evolution pattern...</size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=20>Doesn't look like she's still in the Red Tide anymore.</size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=20>Oh God... did Cradle enter the Hetero Tower, too?</size>

Name: Mechanoid C
Text: <size=30>Medical Robot 4828 thanks you for your assistance.</size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=30>Don't mention it! Would you like to go to the Church of Machina with me? Tag along if you want!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Commandant... What's the... situation...?</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=25>That's a reckless plan.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=25>Lucia, you're badly injured... and the Commandant too...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Then, see you later, Commandant.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=30>Commandant, did I help out even a little?</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=30>Commandant, with me here, there's no problem.</size>

Name: Chief
Text: <size=30>The Hetero Tower... keeps changing...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Let's walk forth together, Commandant.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=25>Commandant, give me your orders.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=25>Liv, activating support mode.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Commandant, don't worry...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>Let's go, Commandant. We have much to do.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=30>I can overcome anything with you and Gray Raven by my side, just like always.</size>

Name: Ishmael
Text: <size=30>You are the second to set foot here... a visitor from human civilization.</size>

Name: Ishmael
Text: <size=30>Let's see... if you can make it to the end.</size>

Name: Ishmael
Text: <size=30>New choices... will bring unexpected changes, won't they? If... that person is "you".</size>

Name: Ishmael
Text: <size=30>It's already started "hatching"?</size>

Name: Ishmael
Text: <size=30>Let me ensure her safe birth... this shouldn't be considered "overstepping".</size>

Name: Ishmael
Text: <size=30>Are there other guests?</size>

Name: Ishmael
Text: <size=30>Hmm... perhaps this way, I can save some energy.</size>

Name: Ishmael
Text: <size=30>Boring.</size>

Name: Ishmael
Text: <size=30>Is it time?</size>

Name: Ishmael
Text: <size=30>It seems it's not time for "maturity" yet...</size>
<size=30>(Soft whispers flowing from the "egg")</size>
<size=30>(Is this the voice from Gray Raven's memories...)</size>
